short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play your games directly in the browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CheerpX Games Runner is an open-source Chrome Extension to run your games directly in the browser.

Games are populated from the personal collection of the user, by integrating with GOG.com. Support for different stores might be added in the future.

The extension is powered by CheerpX, a x86-to-WebAssembly virtual machine. Currently it supports games running on DOS, support for modern games is also planned in the future.

Features:
* Runs historical games from your collection directly in your browser
* Works on any platform, even if not officially supported by the game
* Works on Chromebooks
* No local installation required

Quick Start Guide:
* Install the extension 
* Click on the Extensions button next to your profile icon in Chrome's Toolbar 
* Click on the Pin button next to the CheerpX Games Runner icon to enable it 
* The CheerpX Games Runner icon will now be visible in Chrome's Toolbar.

To start playing games, simply click once on the CheerpX Games Runner icon. It will load a new tab allowing you to select the game or log-in to GOG.com if needed.
